- Lowered the value of the implant as 800 was a bit high - The explosion should now always remove the pawns head since the implant is in the brain
--- Original Description --- V1.0.2 This mod adds an explosive brain implant. Detonate it at will. Craft it at the fabrication bench when the research Bionics is completed.
Note: This mod is still in development, if you use it on an existant save, don't forget to keep a save from before the mod installation.
